Ingredients.1: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Irish stout beer (such as Guinness®)

Ingredients.2: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.3: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (such as Lipton®)

Ingredients.7: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper

Ingredients.9: 1 (16 ounce) package baby red potatoes, cut in half

Directions.1: Mix beer, cream of mushroom soup, onion soup mix, onion, and garlic together in a slow cooker. Season beef chuck roast with salt and pepper, and place in the slow cooker. Arrange the carrots and potatoes around the meat.

Directions.2: Cook on Low for 6 hours, then add the celery. Continue cooking until the roast falls apart easily and the potatoes are softened, about 2 hours more. Serve the meat and vegetables with the remaining gravy on top.
